name: py-oslo-utils

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
The oslo.utils library provides support for common utility type
functions, such as encoding, exception handling, string manipulation,
and time handling.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pbr
dependencies.description:
PBR is a library that injects some useful and sensible default behaviors
into your setuptools run.

dependencies.name: py-iso8601
dependencies.description: Simple module to parse ISO 8601 dates

dependencies.name: py-oslo-i18n
dependencies.description:
The oslo.i18n library contain utilities for working with
internationalization (i18n) features, especially translation for text
strings in an application or library.

dependencies.name: py-pytz
dependencies.description: World timezone definitions, modern and historical.

dependencies.name: py-netaddr
dependencies.description: A system-independent network address manipulation library for Python

dependencies.name: py-debtcollector
dependencies.description:
A collection of Python deprecation patterns and strategies that help
you collect your technical debt in a non-destructive manner.

dependent_to.name: py-python-keystoneclient
dependent_to.description:
This is a client for the OpenStack Identity API, implemented by the
Keystone team

dependent_to.name: py-oslo-serialization
dependent_to.description:
The oslo.serialization library provides support for representing
objects in transmittable and storable formats, such as Base64, JSON and
MessagePack.
